item.title: How to Contribute
item.description: KubeDL is written in the form of Kubernetes operator and use KubeBuilder for code scaffolding. Build the binary make manager Run the tests make test Generate manifests: CRD, RBAC YAML files etc make manifests Build the docker image Replace the image name to your own image export IMG=kubedl/kubedl:v0.3.0 && make docker-build Push the image docker push kubedl/kubedl:v0.

item.title: Code of Conduct
item.description: Our Pledge We as members, contributors, and leaders pledge to make participation in our community a harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of age, body size, visible or invisible disability, ethnicity, sex characteristics, gender identity and expression, level of experience, education, socio-economic status, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, or sexual identity and orientation. We pledge to act and interact in ways that contribute to an open, welcoming, diverse, inclusive, and healthy community.
